participant_1.background:
I would have lunch with my mom, who always knows how to make the best comfort food.
i love the smell of beans.
my favorite player is mike trout.
I love my Acara, it's round and comfortable.
I wear contacts now.

participant_2.background:
I took medication to help with my dust allergy so I could write my book.
my favorite music is country.
My phone will be out and ready to capture the best moments at the festival this weekend!
I once wrote a short story about the cop who pulled me over and read it to him while he was writing my ticket.
My pets are my best friends and they make me laugh every day.

content.text: Hey! I'm doing great! How about yourself?
I'm pretty good! Excited to go to the festival this weekend.
Oh, that sounds fun! What kind of festival is it?
It's a country music festival. I'm excited to see my favorite artists perform.
That's awesome! I love country music too. I'm going to be writing a book about my experience at the festival.
That's so cool! What kind of book are you writing?
It's a fiction book about a woman who goes to a country music festival and falls in love.
That sounds really interesting! I'd love to read it when it's finished.
Thanks! I'll be sure to let you know when it's published.
So, what are your favorite country music artists?
I love Kenny Chesney, Brad Paisley, and Carrie Underwood.
Those are great artists! I love them too.
I'm also a big fan of Eric Church and Luke Bryan.
Me too! Country music is the best!
